changed to correct year and asking price according to ref. and reworded it a bit.

/* Publications */ Deleted irrelevant section. An ad for one former Best Buy person's ebook shouldn't be here.
/* Bankruptcy and liquidation */ I deleted vandalism.
/* Change to Circuit City */ 80px is kind of hard to see
/* Best Buy */ After the comments by one of the hired help at Best Buy are irrelevant to Circuit City's story
/* Conn's */ After the fact transactions by Conn's are irrelevant to Circuit City's story
/* hhgregg */ - If appropriate, put this in a page for hhgregg, not Circuit City.
/* P.C. Richard & Son */ - After the fact transactions by P.C. Richard & Son are irrelevant to Circuit City's story
/* Publications */ Is Wikipedia a place for promotional material like this?

Circuit City Stores, Inc. is owned by its shareholders. Systemax owns the name "Circuit City", its associated brand, and website. The March 19 thing is for the website, not the bankrupt chain.
